result.name: mandatory-work-activity
result.notes: The Mandatory Work Activity programme helps those who have been out of work for a long time to build their work related skills by providing work placements. The data includes individual level information relating to participants, as well as geographic and financial information.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Mandatory Work Activity

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/mandatory-work-activity    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
